Plot: A semi-literate and lonely odd-job man bonds with a much older and well-read woman.
Title: My Afternoons with Margueritte
Writer: Jean Becker (screenplay), Jean-Loup Dabadie (screenplay), Marie-Sabine Roger (book)
Actors: Gérard Depardieu, Gisèle Casadesus, Maurane, Sophie Guillemin
tomatoConsensus: It's sentimental and treacly, but that's not enough to prevent My Afternoons with Margueritte from being truly affecting.
